original_title: Road accident kills two, injures eight others
original_body_lines: Two persons have been reported dead while eight others, including two children, were injured after a Canter truck collided with a tractor.
Police revealed that the two vehicles collided at Walekade on the Polonnaruwa – Onegama road a short while ago (15 April).
The injured children are believed to be 12 and 14 years old.
